meanings.definition: A type of amino acid found in many animal proteins.
meanings.sent1: Taurines are important for building strong muscles.
meanings.sent2: I learned in science class that taurines are essential for our bodies.
meanings.sent3: The taurines in the steak were having a party in my stomach!
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like taurines, fueling her through the marathon of life.
meanings.sent5: The taurines danced around happily in the protein shake.

meanings.definition: A group of chemical compounds containing a taurine molecule.
meanings.sent1: The lab study focused on analyzing the structure of taurines.
meanings.sent2: The taurines in the formula reacted with other compounds.
meanings.sent3: The taurines in the beaker were gossiping about the other molecules.
meanings.sent4: The taurines linked together like a chain, forming a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the taurines looked like tiny building blocks.

meanings.definition: A substance used in energy drinks to improve athletic performance.
meanings.sent1: Athletes often rely on taurines to boost their energy levels.
meanings.sent2: The energy drink contained high levels of taurines.
meanings.sent3: The taurines in the drink were cheering on the runner.
meanings.sent4: His performance soared like taurines after drinking the energy shot.
meanings.sent5: The taurines in the energy drink were like little helpers for the body.
